full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 111 of 228 787 LC2Qmax3 Alessi - Direct (Government's Exhibit 298 received in evidence) 1 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, can we please publish this? 2 THE COURT: You may. 3 MS. COMEY: Oh, excuse me. Thank you, your Honor. 4 BY MS. COMEY: 5 Q. Mr. Alessi, can you please walk us through the layout of 6 this house using Government Exhibit 298? 7 A. Can I use my finger? 8 THE COURT: I think you have to describe it with your 9 words. Maybe start in the left-hand corner. 10 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, is the touch screen available 11 on the witness's screen? 12 THE COURT: I'm not sure. 13 MS. COMEY: May I ask Ms. Drescher to check, please? 14 THE COURT: Sure. 15 MS. COMEY: Thank you. 16 A. Okay. I gonna describe the front entrance going into the 17 main house, and I will describe the back entrance going from 18 the garage section of the -- 19 Q. Mr. Alessi, I'm going to stop you there. I don't think the 20 touch screen is working, so I'm going to work with Ms. Drescher 21 to zoom in on the parts we're talking about. 22 THE COURT: Actually, we have our jurors' lunch, so we 23 can break if Ms. Williams is ready. Let me just check. We'll 24 break and then you can work on that during the break. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017984
